lead_paragraph: A single trade by Waddell & Reed Financial helped spark the cascade of market selling on May 6, a source familiar with regulators' report on the so-called flash crash told Reuters.
snippet: A single trade by Waddell & Reed Financial helped spark the cascade of market selling on May 6, said a source familiar with regulators' report on the so-called flash crash.

headline.main: Report on Flash Crash Said to Hide Waddell's Role

abstract: A single trade by Waddell & Reed Financial helped spark the cascade of market selling on May 6, said a source familiar with regulators' report on the so-called flash crash.
